name: The Demon that Stole the Earth!
name_original: The Demon that Stole the Earth!
description:
The Demon that Stole the Earth!

A Playstation 1 graphics inspired first person shooter

The Demon Lord is stealing the Earth, one cube section at a time, it is your duty to put a stop to him!

Played with Keyboard and Mouse

W/A/S/D - Move

Space - Jump

Left shift - Dash

Left Ctrl - Super Jump

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Right Mouse Button - Special Shot
